name: Bird (FutureGoth)
description:
"Bird" is a student game we made over two days. The game jam was our final after an 8 week course in Unity and C#. None of us had touched Unity or C# before this so it was quite an adventure! We want to make something more of it in the future.

You are a bird. A hungry, hungry bird. You just want some worms! Do your best to get them and stay full. Watch out for the knife wielding birds though, gosh what even is their goal here....

Future Goth splits development responsibilities between their members: Alex Pochmara, Natalie Steffen, and Schuyler Rice.
